languages.text: Ответ на ваши усилия — предсмертная искра кабеля и едкий дым. Похоже, подсоединить вид-скрин не выйдет.
Your efforts are rewarded with a dying spark flaring from the cable followed by a whiff of acrid smoke. It appears you will be unable to connect the vid-screen.
languages.original_text: Ответ на ваши усилия — предсмертная искра кабеля и едкий дым. Похоже, подсоединить вид-скрин не выйдет.

traits.locale_text: Your efforts are rewarded with the cable's dying spark and a whiff of acrid smoke. It looks like you won't be able to connect the vid-screen.
Your efforts are rewarded with the cable's dying spark and a whiff of acrid smoke. It looks like you won't be able to connect the vid-screen.
Your efforts are rewarded with a dying spark flaring from the cable followed by a whiff of acrid smoke. It appears you will be unable to connect the vid-screen.
Your efforts are rewarded with a dying spark flaring from the cable followed by a whiff of acrid smoke. It appears you will be unable to connect the vid-screen.
Your efforts are rewarded with a dying spark flaring from the cable followed by a whiff of acrid smoke. It appears you will be unable to connect the vid-screen.
Your efforts are rewarded with a dying spark flaring from the cable followed by a whiff of acrid smoke. It appears you will be unable to connect the vid-screen.

languages.text: Deine Bemühungen werden mit einem sterbenden Funken aus dem Kabel und einer beißenden Rauchwolke belohnt. Wie es scheint, kannst du den Vid-Bildschirm nicht verbinden.
languages.original_text: Your efforts are rewarded with a dying spark flaring from the cable followed by a whiff of acrid smoke. It appears you will be unable to connect the vid-screen.

traits.locale_text: Deine Bemühungen werden mit einem sterbenden Funken aus dem Kabel und einer beißenden Rauchwolke belohnt. Wie es scheint, kannst du den Vid-Bildschirm nicht verbinden.

languages.text: Vos efforts sont récompensés par une étincelle mourante jaillissant du câble, suivie d'une bouffée de fumée âcre. Il semble que vous n'ayez pas réussi à connecter l'écran.
languages.original_text: Your efforts are rewarded with a dying spark flaring from the cable followed by a whiff of acrid smoke. It appears you will be unable to connect the vid-screen.

traits.locale_text: Vos efforts sont récompensés par une étincelle mourante jaillissant du câble, suivie d'une bouffée de fumée âcre. Il semble que vous n'ayez pas réussi à connecter l'écran.

languages.text: Tus esfuerzos se ven recompensados por un desalentador chispazo en el cable, del que luego emana un hilillo de humo de olor penetrante. Parece que no vas a poder conectar la videopantalla.
languages.original_text: Your efforts are rewarded with a dying spark flaring from the cable followed by a whiff of acrid smoke. It appears you will be unable to connect the vid-screen.

traits.locale_text: Tus esfuerzos se ven recompensados por un desalentador chispazo en el cable, del que luego emana un hilillo de humo de olor penetrante. Parece que no vas a poder conectar la videopantalla.

languages.text: 你的努力只带来了这样的结果——垂死的火花从电缆中喷射出来，随后一阵刺鼻的烟雾传来。看来，你无法顺利连接视讯屏幕。
languages.original_text: Your efforts are rewarded with a dying spark flaring from the cable followed by a whiff of acrid smoke. It appears you will be unable to connect the vid-screen.

traits.locale_text: 你的努力只带来了这样的结果——垂死的火花从电缆中喷射出来，随后一阵刺鼻的烟雾传来。看来，你无法顺利连接视讯屏幕。

languages.text: 努力の末、ケーブルから小さな火花が散り、直後に刺激臭がする煙が立ちのぼった。ビデオスクリーンに接続するのは無理のようだ。
languages.original_text: Your efforts are rewarded with a dying spark flaring from the cable followed by a whiff of acrid smoke. It appears you will be unable to connect the vid-screen.

traits.locale_text: 努力の末、ケーブルから小さな火花が散り、直後に刺激臭がする煙が立ちのぼった。ビデオスクリーンに接続するのは無理のようだ。

languages.text: Harcadığın zamanın karşılığını kablodan çıkan kıvılcımda ve ardından gelen keskin bir dumanda buluyorsun. Anlaşılan video ekranını bağlayamayacaksın.
languages.original_text: Your efforts are rewarded with a dying spark flaring from the cable followed by a whiff of acrid smoke. It appears you will be unable to connect the vid-screen.

traits.locale_text: Harcadığın zamanın karşılığını kablodan çıkan kıvılcımda ve ardından gelen keskin bir dumanda buluyorsun. Anlaşılan video ekranını bağlayamayacaksın.
